<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Training Request default">56b3596d07383110151cfc018c1ed0c9</macroponent><name>image_1/src</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
	  var id_image = api.data.look_up_record_2.result.attached_photo.value;
	return '/sys_attachment.do?sys_id='+id_image;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-06 11:45:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>24db395807753110151cfc018c1ed026</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>image_1/src</sys_name><sys_package display_value="HROB-POC" source="x_1106637_hrob_poc">b73392a507203110151cfc018c1ed083</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="HROB-POC">b73392a507203110151cfc018c1ed083</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_24db395807753110151cfc018c1ed026</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-06 11:45:52</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
